data.text:

Enjoy Norma Percy’s reflections on the infamous break-in; there is also her quest for exclusive interviews and the jaw-dropping twists that captivated a nation entirely.

BBC iPlayer only lets people in the UK watch its shows because of rules and agreements. If you try to watch Eyewitness to History: Norma Percy on Watergate in the US, you will get a message saying it is only for viewers in the UK.

But PureVPN can help! It hides your internet address and keeps your connection safe, making BBC iPlayer think you are watching from the UK. This way, you can watch Eyewitness to History: Norma Percy on Watergate in the US without any problems.

Eyewitness to History: Norma Percy on Watergate airs on Thursday, August 8th, 2024, at 8:00 pm on BBC Four.

How Long is Eyewitness to History: Norma Percy on Watergate?

Eyewitness to History: Norma Percy on Watergate has a duration of 60 minutes.

What is Eyewitness to History: Norma Percy on Watergate All About?

Tune in to explore with us one of America’s most shocking political scandals with Eyewitness to History: Norma Percy on Watergate. This documentary is not your average history lesson. Here, Filmmaker Norma Percy takes us back to 1974; it is the time when a break-in at the Democratic National Committee’s headquarters unraveled a web of deceit that reached the highest levels of government.

Norma Percy told this amazing story in 1994 to reach more people, and now she is back with new information and stories from behind the scenes. Watch along as She talks to important people who were there, like Archibald Cox, John Dean, Bob Woodward, and Carl Bernstein, giving us a close-up look at the scandal that changed America.

What is the Cast of Eyewitness to History: Norma Percy on Watergate?

Here is the cast of Eyewitness to History: Norma Percy on Watergate:

Norma Percy (Filmmaker/Host)

Archibald Cox (Interviewee, Special Prosecutor)

John Dean (Interviewee, White House Counsel)

Bob Woodward (Interviewee, Washington Post Journalist)

Carl Bernstein (Interviewee, Washington Post Journalist)

What is the Genre of Eyewitness to History: Norma Percy on Watergate?

Eyewitness to History: Norma Percy on Watergate is a historical documentary.

What is the focus of the documentary?

It focuses on the Watergate scandal that led to President Richard Nixon’s resignation in 1974.

What makes this documentary different from the original series?

It includes personal reflections from Norma Percy on the challenges and triumphs she faced while creating the original series.

Why is the Watergate scandal significant?

It was a pivotal moment in American history that led to the resignation of a sitting president and had lasting impacts on American politics.

What challenges did Norma Percy face while creating the original series?

Gaining exclusive access to key figures involved in the scandal and piecing together a comprehensive narrative.

What impact did the Watergate scandal have on American society?

It led to widespread distrust in government and significant political reforms.
